text: Longtan may refer to several places: ==Burma== *Longtan, Langhko, Burma ==Mainland China== *Longtan Dam (龙滩大坝), dam in Guangxi *Longtan District, Jilin City (龙潭区), Jilin City, Jilin *Longtan District *Longtan Subdistrict, Jilin City, in Longtan District, Jilin City *Longtan Subdistrict, Chengdu, in Chenghua District ;Towns (龙潭镇) *Longtan, Huoqiu County, Anhui *Longtan, Fuling District, title: Longtan
